name: Flight from Paris to Berlin
description: The amount of CO2 produced when flying economy class from Paris to Berlin.

description: CO2 produced when driving a mid-size car from NYC to Boston.

name: Round-trip flight from New York to London
description: CO₂ emissions from an economy class round-trip flight between New York and London.

name: Annual electricity usage of an average U.S. household
description: CO₂ emissions from the average annual electricity consumption of a U.S. household.

name: Producing 1 kilogram of beef
description: CO₂ emissions associated with the production of 1 kilogram of beef.

name: Charging a smartphone for a year
description: CO₂ emissions from charging a smartphone daily for one year.

name: Driving 100 kilometers in a gasoline car
description: CO₂ emissions from driving 100 kilometers in an average gasoline-powered car.

name: One load of laundry in a washing machine
description: CO₂ emissions from washing a load of laundry at 40°C.

name: Using a 10-watt LED light bulb for 5 hours daily for a year
description: CO₂ emissions from using a 10-watt LED light bulb for 5 hours daily over a year.

name: Producing 1 kilogram of cheese
description: CO₂ emissions associated with the production of 1 kilogram of cheese.

description: CO₂ emissions from streaming 1 hour of high-definition video.

name: Manufacturing a new laptop
description: CO₂ emissions from the production of a new laptop.
